search_query: Bentley Systems BSY competitors 2025 infrastructure engineering software
context: Bentley Systems (Nasdaq: BSY) is the infrastructure engineering software company providing innovative software to advance the world's infrastructure, sustaining both the global economy and environment. As of mid-2025, Bentley has a market cap of $17.6B with trailing 12-month revenue of $1.42B. Their solutions are used for design, construction, and operations of roads, bridges, rail, transit, water, wastewater, public works, utilities, buildings, campuses, mining, and industrial facilities. Offerings are powered by the iTwin Platform for infrastructure digital twins and include MicroStation, Bentley Open applications, Seequent's software for geoprofessionals, ProjectWise (project delivery), SYNCHRO (construction management), and AssetWise (asset operations). In 2025, Bentley introduced OpenSight Plus for AI-powered infrastructure engineering. Most recent deal was M&A with Cadventure (IT Consulting) on May 22, 2025. Bentley has 851 active competitors.
